Text: RE Existing Trading Track Rotationswe have externals coming in next Wednesday From the resumes shortlisted by you of which were interviewed by your direct reports remainder were not interested in Houstonjob of which were recommeded by your traders of which accepted an nd round interview five of which are confirmed for next Wednesday could not make that date We therefore have a confirmd number of to interview next Wednesday however I was given additional internal names last night to follow up on this am I will confirm exact number of interviews later this morning but could be anywhere in the region from I have asked the current group in the Trading Track to faciliate an office tour of the trading floorsgas control room Following which there will be an informal lunch for all of the candidates in one of the conference rooms to include the current Trading Track folks Interviews will follow at pm at the Allen Center Schedules are being formalised today and will be forwarded to you Thanks karen Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Thursday May PM To Buckley Karen Subject RE Existing Trading Track Rotations Great Do we have any outside people Original Message From Buckley Karen Sent Wed AM To Lavorato John Hillis Kimberly Cc Subject FW Existing Trading Track Rotations John Following the interviews next week suggest your management team get together to review the rotations for the Trading Track to see if they continue to meet businessEmploye needs to ensure we have accurate data from a tracking perspective Karen Original Message From Buckley Karen Sent Wednesday May AM To GilbertSmith Doug Will Lloyd White Stacey Baughman Don Arora Harry Davis Dana Herndon Rogers Gossett David Gaskill Chris Superty Robert Lagrasta Fred McMichael Jr Ed Neal Scott Subject Existing Trading Track Rotations trading track rotationsxls Attached is the current list of rotations for the Trading Track participants and future assigned rotations as decided at the time of hiring Can you please reconfirm you have these people in your group currently as I appear to have conflicting information I will resend if any changes occur If there is any movement of these people between groups can you plese keep me in the loop Kind regards Karen x

FW Existing Trading Track RotationsFollowing the interviews next week suggest your management team get together to review the rotations for the Trading Track to see if they continue to meet businessEmploye needs to ensure we have accurate data from a tracking perspective Karen Original Message From Buckley Karen Sent Wednesday May AM To GilbertSmith Doug Will Lloyd White Stacey Baughman Don Arora Harry Davis Dana Herndon Rogers Gossett David Gaskill Chris Superty Robert Lagrasta Fred McMichael Jr Ed Neal Scott Subject Existing Trading Track Rotations Attached is the current list of rotations for the Trading Track participants and future assigned rotations as decided at the time of hiring Can you please reconfirm you have these people in your group currently as I appear to have conflicting information I will resend if any changes occur If there is any movement of these people between groups can you plese keep me in the loop Kind regards Karen x
interview Justin OMalley Cc you like to move forward and offer a role int he trading track to the above Karen

RETo assist with the external evaluation I have grouped all the external people together that way the designated itnerview team is focused solely on nonenron people Karen Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Tuesday May AM To Allen Phillip K Arnold John Aucoin Berney C Bentley Corry Coulter Kayne Davis Mark Dana Gaskill Chris Gilbertsmith Doug Gossett Jeffrey C Grigsby Mike Herndon Rogers Kitchen Louise Lavorato John Martin Thomas A McMichael Jr Ed Neal Scott Presto Kevin M Schwieger Jim Shively Hunter S Sturm Fletcher J Superty Robert Thomas Martin White Stacey Will Lloyd Cc Buckley Karen Subject On Wednesday we will be having a mini Trading Track interview session The quality may not resemble the first session we had but I thought it would be worth it if we can find a couple more folks to put in the program We will probably have a much bigger one later in the year after the new analysts and associates join I had a couple of observations from last time I think we were too hard on external candidates There are or external candidates Remember that they dont have the Enron grounding that the internal candidates have Most of them are not in the Gas or Electricity industry Try to evaluate them on their intrinsic qualities Some people have not thought about trading concepts and are unfamiliar with trading lingo That doesnt mean that they will not be good traders one day I think we were a little biased based on someones ability to run a stack tommorrow Regards John

Please read Interview Schedule May th Cc Each of you have received your interview schedule and resumes for tomorrows interviews taking place at Allen Center th Floor from You have been broken down into four teams as per your schedule Please note that the candidate will be stationed in the office and you will rotate from office to office all of which are adjacent Please ensure that you arrive promptly for your first interview at pm and keep to min time limt per interview Each team will be assigned a coordinator to assist you through the event Red Team Interviewing Candidates Karen Buckley Green Team Interviewing Candidates Todd Peikert Purple Team Interviewing Candidates Courtnie Parker Blue Team Interviewing Candidates Adrianne Engler We look forward to seeing you tomorrow Rgds Karen

Trading Track Interviews May th Cc We have people scheduled for interview for the ENA Trading Track next Wednesday May th from pm pm You will each interview candidates We have Internal candidates and six external Each of you will receive your schedules resumes evaluations forms and location details on Tuesday Please note a debrief will take place at the Double Tree Hotel directly after interviews exact location will be included in your interview pack Thank you for your participation in this recruiting event Regards Karen x

RE Trading Track Interviews Wednesday May th Cc I am sure we can work with that karen Original Message From Shively Hunter S Sent Monday May AM To Buckley Karen Cc Lavorato John Subject RE Trading Track Interviews Wednesday May th Can we delay the interviews by one hour AGA is released at on Wednesdays Original Message From Buckley Karen Sent Friday May PM To Allen Phillip K Arnold John Aucoin Berney Black Don Davis Mark Dana Gaskill Chris GilbertSmith Doug Gossett Jeffrey C Grigsby Mike Herndon Rogers Thomas Martin McMichael Jr Ed Neal Scott Presto Kevin Schwieger Jim Shively Hunter S Sturm Fletcher Superty Robert White Stacey Will Lloyd Cc Lavorato John Hillis Kimberly Dozier Melissa Kitchen Louise Subject Trading Track Interviews Wednesday May th All We will be scheduling interviews for the Trading Track Wednesday May th from pm to approximately pm with a debrief afterwards We will be interviewing approximately candidates both internal and external Please reserve this time in your calander If you are unable to particpate please let me know otherwise you will be contacted with regards to locationconfirmed timesresumesetc shortly Any questions please do not hesitate to contact me Kind regards Karen x

Trading Track Interviews Wednesday May th Cc We will be scheduling interviews for the Trading Track Wednesday May th from pm to approximately pm with a debrief afterwards We will be interviewing approximately candidates both internal and external Please reserve this time in your calander If you are unable to particpate please let me know otherwise you will be contacted with regards to locationconfirmed timesresumesetc shortly Any questions please do not hesitate to contact me Kind regards Karen x

Trading Track Interviews May th Cc Attached are eleven internal people thus far I am trying to chase down one more person however he is on vacation I would like to proceed with an email to the above tomorrow am in addtion to your management teamInterview Team From the resumes that you reviewed people have agreed to speak with your traders the remainder have yet to return our calls Is there specific names you would like to handle the telephone interviews or are you happy for me to select from the list Once confirmed I will forward the resumes to the approrpriate traders Thanks Karen x

Trading Track Rotations Cc Attached as per your request is the updated Trading Track Rotations to include previous rotations When you have a few mins can we review and I can schedule a meeting for your team and you to finalise future rotations I know there are requests for movement of these people Thx Karen

Update Trading Track Rotations Cc Thank you for responding with updates with respect to the current rotations of the Trading Track Participants Attached is the revised version I expect this may somewhat revise subject to any new intake of TT candidates Thanks Karen

RE Dinner for the Trading Track Candidatesthanks Original Message From Lavorato John Sent Wednesday May AM To Buckley Karen Subject RE Dinner for the Trading Track Candidates Im not sure that we have enough candidates to bother Original Message From Buckley Karen Sent Tuesday May PM To Lavorato John Cc Hillis Kimberly Engler Adrianne Subject Dinner for the Trading Track Candidates John To ensure a consistent approach with the previous trading track interviews we will shcedule a dinner the night before the interviews Tuesday th May Your entire InterviewManagement Team will be invited people I trust that you are availablehappy for us to proceed on this Karen x

Dinner for the Trading Track Candidates Cc To ensure a consistent approach with the previous trading track interviews we will shcedule a dinner the night before the interviews Tuesday th May Your entire InterviewManagement Team will be invited people I trust that you are availablehappy for us to proceed on this Karen x

Meeting Tuesday Trading Track Rotations Cc A Trading Track meeting is scheduled for Tuesday June th at pm conference room to discuss Existing Participants CurrentFuture Rotations expected graduation dates New Hire Future Rotationsexpected graduation dates Attached for your review is the updated rotational list I have included previous rotations as per a request Kind Regards Karen B x
